```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE)
library("data.table")
library("RColorBrewer")
library("plotly")
library("MLmetrics")

PATH_TO_DATA <- "~/Professional/DSPortfolio/Most-Recent-Cohorts-All-Data-Elements.csv"
```

```{r loading-data}
s_data <- data.table::fread(PATH_TO_DATA)
s_data.ncol <- ncol(s_data)

variables <- names(s_data)

any_missing_value <- lapply(
  variables,
  function(variable){
    all(complete.cases(s_data[[variable]]))
  }
)



is_any_missing_value <- all(unlist(any_missing_value))

cor(,method = c("pearson"))

inst_count <- unlist(lapply(
  s_data$INSTNM,
  function(inst){
    length(which(s_data$INSTNM == inst))
  }
))

View(s_data_inst_dcr3_count <- cbind(s_data[,c("UNITID","OPEID","INSTNM","CITY","CDR3")],inst_count))

```
